explanation: To complete the task of placing a towel in the left sink and moving a white towel from its hanger to the left-hand sink, we will need to use the Cloth, HandTowel, and Towel objects. The Cloth can be used to clean the sink before placing the towel, the HandTowel can be used to dry the sink after cleaning, and the Towel can be placed in the left sink as instructed.
